name: Markov Transition Analysis
description: Analyzes inter-pixel transition probabilities using Markov chain models. AI images show different transition patterns compared to natural photographs.
algorithm: First-order Markov Chain + Transition Matrix Analysis
mechanism: Builds transition probability matrix from adjacent pixel differences. Entropy and transition patterns differ between AI and real images.
parameters: States: quantized gradient levels, Direction: horizontal
useCase: Analyzing pixel transition patterns for AI detection
